name: runtime-sim

on:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  sim:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-go@v5
        with:
          go-version: "1.22"
      - name: Install deps
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y clang llvm libbpf-dev bpftool linux-tools-common
      - name: Build
        run: make build
      - name: Run simulation
        run: |
          sudo timeout 8s ./bin/hello-ebpf-loader > /tmp/out.txt 2>/tmp/err.txt || true
          true
          true
          true
          cat /tmp/out.txt || true
          test -s /tmp/out.txt
